content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to search for "top language learning resources" on Google, which returned a list of 8 websites. I retrieved a text summary of the top language learning resources from one of the websites and successfully wrote it to a file. The text provides a list of various language learning resources and tools, including apps like Mondly, uTalk, and Duolingo, language exchange platforms like italki and Tandem, audio courses like Michel Thomas and Pimsleur, and podcast courses like Coffee Break Languages. The author also recommends LingQ, Glossika, and LinguaLift for language learning. The text emphasizes the importance of finding resources that fit one\'s learning style and preferences. My computer confirmed that the file was written successfully. Then, my user gave me a command to browse a website for information on the best language learning resources. However, the text summary mentioned an error preventing an answer to the question "What are the best language learning resources?" on Quora. It suggested waiting and trying again, and enabling Javascript to continue. There is no information provided on the best language learning resources.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide a clear answer to the question of what the best language learning resources are, as the effectiveness of each resource may vary depending on the individual's learning style and goals. However, the text provides a variety of language learning resources and tips, including DuoLingo, Busuu, LiveMocha, FSI Language Courses, LingQ, Pimsleur, Assimil, and Michel Thomas. The author also shares personal tips for language learning, such as finding a good book, practicing with friends, watching dramas, and immersing oneself in the culture of the target language. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.quora.com/)', ' (https://www.quora.com/profile/Cyprien-Rusu)', 'Cyprien Rusu (https://www.quora.com/profile/Cyprien-Rusu)', 'Updated 3y (https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-most-effective-ways-to-learn-a-new-language/answer/Cyprien-Rusu?no_redirect=1)', 'RelatedWhat are the most effective ways to learn a new language? (https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-most-effective-ways-to-learn-a-new-language?no_redirect=1)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "question": "What are the best language learning resources?"}}}'}]
"""
